title: satva guNa viracitAnga shailAvatAtanga
sahitya:
satva guNa viracitAnga shailAvatAtanga shubhAnga
satya makuTa dharma kaTaka mangaLa tAraka nAma hArAlankAra


anupallavi

  nitya jIvana jIvana tanaya nirupama guNa mana nirmala vinaya bhakta brndAraka 
bhAvita gaNya paramOttama raghurAma dUta divipati natAnucAra kSiti nutAnuvara
				(madhyamakAla)
paramOttama raghurAma dUta divipati nAthAnucara kSiti pati natAnuvara shrI 


caraNam    shrI rAma pAda smaraNAnanda kSiti sutA dukkha hrta hanumanta
ArAdhita sarva sajjanAnanda avanata nArada gIta svacchanda
angulIyaka tathIya jAnaki Anana kamala vilOhita nayana
				(madhyamakAla)
anagha naga dharaNa vinuta sura caraNa gaganamapi gamana kali kaluSa haraNa
